inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Papillary thyroid cancer dx w/ right neck mass

inclusion.criterion: After total thyroidectomy, patients who have undergone 131I therapy for the second time or more after recurrence or regional lymph node metastasis after 131I treatment for the first time are required.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: s/p XRT to neck and Metastatic to lymph nodes and adrenal glands

inclusion.criterion: After the first 131I treatment, patients with differentiated thyroid who were treated with 131I for more than 3 months.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: After total thyroidectomy, patients who have undergone 131I therapy for the second time or more after recurrence or regional lymph node metastasis after 131I treatment for the first time are required.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: After the first 131I treatment, patients with differentiated thyroid who were treated with 131I for more than 3 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of various antibiotics within three months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having a history of alcoholism for more than 2 years and a history of smoking throughout the year
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having oral, respiratory and gastrointestinal diseases
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: worsening dysphagia for solids, poor oral intake

exclusion.criterion: Has a variety of metabolic diseases, such as obesity, hypertension, diabetes, stones, various liver diseases, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having other autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, inflammatory bowel disease, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of gastrointestinal surgery or other recent surgical history
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Has a family history of genetic disease, mental illness, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Research subjects are participating in other research topics
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone XRT to the neck. They have a history of poor oral intake and weight loss.
